target.name: build.update.jar
target.description: Build the plug-in: dexter-eclipse for an update site.

target.name: build.jars
target.description: Compile classes and build nested jars for the plug-in: dexter-eclipse.

target.description: Create a zip containing all the elements for the plug-in: dexter-eclipse.
